#Setup Workspace
```{r setup, message=F}
#Define directories of interest
data_dir  <- "Z:\\Research Projects/BiodiversiTREE/spatial_analysis/II_work/"
workspace <- "C:\\ScratchWorkspace/"
wbt_path  <- "C:\\Workspace/WBT/whitebox_tools"

#Download required libraries
library('tidyr')
library('dplyr')
library('lubridate')
library('dygraphs')
library('xts')
library('raster')
library('sf')

#gather data
dem<-raster(paste0(data_dir, "dem_clip"))

```


#Watershed Delineation
Here, we use whitebox GAT tools to delineate the watershed. 
```{r}
#Write DEM to workspace
dem<-na.omit(dem)
writeRaster(dem, paste0(workspace,"dem.tif"), overwrite=T)

#Filter DEM
system(paste(paste(wbt_path), 
            "-r=EdgePreservingMeanFilter", 
             paste0("--wd=",workspace),
            "-i='dem_.tif'", 
            "-o='dem_edgepreservingfilter.tif'",
            "filter=10", 
            "threshold=100"))




#Breach single-cell pits
system(paste(paste(wbt_path), 
            "-r=BreachSingleCellPits", 
             paste0("--wd=",workspace),
            "--dem='dem.tif'", 
            "-o='dem_breachedsinglecells.tif'"))

```
